settings.title: Settings
settings.access: Consult statistic pages outside of your LAN
settings.Users: Allowed users to consult web statistic
settings.skipPrivateIp: Ignore hits from your local/trusted networks
settings.SendReport: Email the PDF reports to root
settings.MinHitDomain: Only show domains with min. hits
settings.MinHitHost: Only show hosts with min. hits
settings.MinHitLogin: Only show users with min. hits
settings.MinHitRobot: Only show robots with min. hits
settings.MinHitDownloads: Only show download with min. hits
settings.MinHitFile: Only show pages with min. hits
settings.MinHitOs: Only show OS with min. hits
settings.MinHitBrowser: Only show Browser with min. hits
settings.MaxNbOfScreenSizesShown: Max. number of screen size show
settings.MinHitScreenSize: Only show screen size with min. hits
settings.MinHitRefer: Only show referrers with min. hits
settings.MinHitKeyphrase: Only show keyphrases with min. hits
settings.MinHitKeyword: Only show keywords with min. hits

validation.not_valid_username: The user name is not valid
